tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE waste_disposal_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  location VARCHAR,
  weight FLOAT,
  disposal_method VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE waste_disposal_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    location VARCHAR,
    waste_type VARCHAR,
    quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE waste_disposal_sites (
  site_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_name TEXT,
  city TEXT,
  region TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE waste_collection (
  collection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  collection_date DATE,
  site_id INT,
  amount_collected FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE waste_analysis (
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  analysis_date DATE,
  collection_id INT,
  analysis_result TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE waste_disposal_sites (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_name VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  disposal_capacity DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE waste_collection_trucks (
  truck_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  truck_model VARCHAR(50),
  capacity DECIMAL,
  driver_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE waste_collection_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  truck_id INT,
  collection_date DATE,
  waste_type VARCHAR(50),
  weight DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE waste_management_strategies (
  strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_name VARCHAR(50),
  effectiveness_rating INT,
  implementation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE waste_disposal_sites (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_name VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  capacity DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE waste_collection_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  collection_date DATE,
  site_id INT,
  waste_type VARCHAR(30),
  weight_in_kg DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE waste_trends (
  trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  year INT,
  trend_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE waste_management_strategies (
  strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_name VARCHAR(50),
  implementation_date DATE,
  responsible_team VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE waste_analysis_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE,
  analyst_id INT,
  findings TEXT
)
